# omergulcicek.com

> Personal website and blog of Ömer Gülçiçek, Senior Frontend Engineer. React, Next.js, TypeScript, and modern web development. Technical articles (Turkish), project showcases, experience timeline, and bookmarks. Built with Next.js 16, MDX, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.

Site sections: Home (/), Blog (/blog), Experiences (/experiences), Projects (/projects), Bookmarks (/bookmarks), About (/about). Blog posts are in Turkish unless stated otherwise. Primary topics: React, Next.js, CSS, frontend architecture, state management, TanStack, form validation, accessibility, and developer tooling.

## About & Main Pages

- [About](https://omergulcicek.com/about): Bio, skills, services, and contact
- [Experiences](https://omergulcicek.com/experiences): Work and education timeline
- [Projects](https://omergulcicek.com/projects): Open source and side projects
- [Bookmarks](https://omergulcicek.com/bookmarks): Curated links and resources

## Blog – Technical (React, Next.js, Frontend)

- [Makineler İçin Dokümantasyon: llms.txt ile AI-Native Dönemi](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/makineler-icin-dokumantasyon-llms-txt-ai-native): llms.txt standard and AI-friendly documentation
- [React State Yönetim Mimarisi](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/react-state-yonetim-mimarisi): React state management architecture
- [Next.js 16: Turbopack, Cache Components ve Yeni Mimari Dönemi](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/nextjs-16-turbopack-cache-components-ve-yeni-mimari-donemi): Next.js 16 and new architecture
- [TanStack Start: Resolving the tanstack-start-injected-head-scripts Error](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/tanstack-start-resolving-the-tanstack-start-injected-head-scripts-error): TanStack Start troubleshooting
- [React 19 ile Gelen Yenilik: useOptimistic Hook Kullanımı](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/react-19-ile-gelen-yenilik-use-optimistic-hook-kullanimi): useOptimistic hook in React 19
- [2026 için React ve AI Stack'i](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/react-ai-stack-2026): React and AI stack for 2026
- [Frontend'in Parlayan Yıldızı: shadcn/ui ile Tanışın](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/frontendin-parlayan-yildizi-shadcn-ui-ile-tanisin): Introduction to shadcn/ui
- [Nizam - Next.js 16 Boilerplate](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/nizam-nextjs-16-boilerplate): Next.js 16 boilerplate project
- [React Hook Form İçin Akıllı Mask ve Doğrulama](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/react-hook-form-icin-akilli-mask-ve-dogrulama): Form masking and validation with React Hook Form

## Blog – CSS & Styling

- [2026'da Hayatımıza Girecek Yeni CSS Özellikleri](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/2026da-hayatimiza-girecek-yeni-css-ozellikleri): New CSS features in 2026
- [CSS Container Sorguları](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/css-container-sorgulari): CSS container queries
- [CSS Mantıksal Özellikler](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/css-mantiksal-ozellikler): CSS logical properties
- [Tailwind CSS v4](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/tailwind-css-v4): Tailwind CSS v4 overview

## Blog – Career & Environment

- [2025 Yılında Frontend Developer Olmak](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/2025-yilinda-frontend-developer-olmak): Frontend development in 2025
- [Frontend Çalışma Ortamım: Cursor, Eklentiler](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/frontend-calisma-ortamim-cursor-eklentiler): Cursor and dev environment
- [Kaliteli Yazılımcı Nasıl Olunur?](https://omergulcicek.com/blog/kateliteli-yazilimci-nasil-olunur): Software quality and practices
